resources.string: Share this 4 digit code with your friends. When all have joined hit the ready button
Enter the Game Code that you have been given:

This is a conversation-based game that prompts players to tell stories, which the other players must determine whether it is true or not. \nEach turn one player will be the storyteller, the others will be listeners

Storyteller 

Tell your story. If you make your story up then you must defend your story to trick your fellow players into believing that it truly happened. 

Players believe your lie? + 20 points 
(per listener convinced) 

Safely tell a true story? + 10 points 
(per listener convinced) 
No one believes your lie? - 20 points


Listeners 

Listen to the story and try to figure out whether the Storyteller is telling a real story from personal experience, or are making it up. You will have the chance after they tell their story to question them, and guess if its true or not. 

Guess correctly? + 10 points 

Get duped by a fake story? - 5 points 

 Falsely accuse a player of lying or fail to guess in time? - 10 points
Either the first person to 500 points or the person with the highest score after 10 rounds will be declared the winner
